title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
overview: Adapted from the controversial literary classic by D.H. Lawrence, Lady Chatterleyâ€™s Lover is a sweeping, romantic musical with a score by John Robinson and a book by Phil Willmott that played the West End in the summer of 2021. Georgia Lennon stars as Lady Chatterley, an upper-class wife whose love affair with a working-class man prompts her to consider what it means to have a life well-lived.
